commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Good luck, you two!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hold up! Okay, I get it! Stop pushing me! Wh-Whooooooa!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Eeeeek! My feet are sliding all over the place! Wh-What do I do?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Kasumin! Straighten up your back!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Nope, nope, nope, nope, and nope! I'll fall if I move a muscle! I'll fall if I... GAH!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Kasumi! Are you okay?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Aaaaaah!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Huh? M-Maki?! You're gonna crash into the wall if you keep going! Stop!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I-I can't... I can't move my feet right... Ack!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Makiiiiii!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh my gosh! Can't either of you skate?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Owwww, my nose is throbbing...

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: It's a little red, but I don't think you've broken it.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Maki, can you really not skate?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I-It's not that I can't... Ow!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Your foot? Does your foot hurt, Maki? Oh dear, let me have a look.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Ah...

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Hmm? There's a band-aid on the back of your ankle. Did you get a sore from your shoes?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: A shoe sore... So that is why you could not move your feet. Then why did you decide to come along today?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I already told you, because Rin wanted to come. When she realized nobody else could come, she was about to bail on it herself. She looked so sad...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I couldn't help but want to go with her after seeing her face. I also wanted to go skating with Rin as well, so...

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: You had me in mind the whole time, Maki? Thanks! I love you! I'm sorry I forced you onto the ice just now...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: It's okay, really. I should be sorry for not saying anything about my shoe sore.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: So that's why. Does that mean Kasumi was forcing herself to push through some kind of injury as well?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No, I believe she just genuinely cannot skate. Am I correct?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Whine* Yeah, you're right! I've never skated before in my life! I didn't think it'd be this hard to just stand on the ice let alone skate!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Then you should've been honest about it! Nobody would've laughed, you know?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It's not about being laughed at! It's about my pride as the super-cute school idol, Kasumin!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Hmm... That means we're left with Mari, Rin, Setsuna, and me for the final round.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No. I would like to find a way for Maki and Kasumi to participate, somehow.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: But Maki's injured and Kasumi can't skate properly yet.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I know! But... But we made a decision for everyone here to participate! I want to skate to the very end with every single one of you!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The skating rink of youth only shines once it's paved with the hopes of everyone who skates across it! That is what they said in the anime!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: The anime, huh? I knew that line was too good to just get plucked out of the air!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: There must be some way... Oh, I know! I have the perfect idea!
